name: FeatureManagement

methods.name: changeProtection
methods.signature: public static void changeProtection(String apiName, String typeApiName, String protection)
methods.description: Hides or reveals custom permissions, or reveals custom objects, in your subscriber’s org.

params.name: protection
params.description: The API name of the custom object or custom permission to show or hide—for example, 'MyCustomObject__c' or 'MyCustomPermission'. The API name of the type that you want to show or hide: 'CustomObject' or 'CustomPermission'.  To show a custom object or custom permission, 'Unprotected'.  To hide a custom permission, 'Protected'.

methods.name: checkPackageBooleanValue
methods.description: Checks the value__c value of the FeatureParameterBoolean__c record for a feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You set the record’s value using setPackageBooleanValue(apiName, value).

params.name: apiName
params.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to check—for example, 'SpecialAccessAvailable'.

methods.name: checkPackageDateValue
methods.description: Checks the value__c value of the FeatureParameterDate__c record for a feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can set the record’s value using setPackageDateValue(apiName, value).

params.name: apiName
params.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to check—for example, 'TrialExpirationDate'.

methods.name: checkPackageIntegerValue
methods.description: Checks the value__c value of the FeatureParameterInteger__c record for a feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can set the record’s value using setPackageIntegerValue(apiName, value).

params.name: apiName
params.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to check—for example, 'NumberOfLicenses'.

methods.name: checkPermission
methods.description: Checks whether a custom permission is enabled.

params.name: apiName
params.description: The API name of the custom permission to check the value of—for example, 'MyCustomPermission'.

methods.name: setPackageBooleanValue
methods.signature: public static void setPackageBooleanValue(String apiName, Boolean value)
methods.description: Sets the value__c value of the FeatureParameterBoolean__c record for a subscriber-to-LMO feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can check the record’s value using checkPackageBooleanValue(apiName).

params.name: value
params.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to set—for example, 'SpecialAccessAvailable'. The value to assign to the value__c field on the FeatureParameterBoolean__c record that associates the feature parameter with its related license.

methods.name: setPackageDateValue
methods.signature: public static void setPackageDateValue(String apiName, Date value)
methods.description: Sets the value__c value of the FeatureParameterDate__c record for a subscriber-to-LMO feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can check the record’s value using checkPackageDateValue(apiName).

params.name: value
params.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to set—for example, 'TrialExpirationDate'. The value to assign to the value__c field on the FeatureParameterDate__c record that associates the feature parameter with its related license.

methods.name: setPackageIntegerValue
methods.signature: public static void setPackageIntegerValue(String apiName, Integer value)
methods.description: Sets the value__c value of the FeatureParameterInteger__c record for a subscriber-to-LMO feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can check the record’s value using checkPackageIntegerValue(apiName).

params.name: value
params.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to set—for example, 'NumberOfLicenses'. The value to assign to the value__c field on the FeatureParameterInteger__c record that associates the feature parameter with its related license.

description: Use the methods in the System.FeatureManagement class to check and modify the values of feature parameters, and to show or hide custom objects and custom permissions in your subscribers’ orgs.
